Salt_Lake_City.Fortunato Anselmo House:
The Fortunato Anselmo House (also known as the Ronald L. Beers House) is a historic house built in Late Victorian style located at 164 South 900 East in Salt Lake City, Utah.


== Description and history ==
It was built in 1903 by a carpenter and contractor named Silas B. Wood at approximately $4,000 in cost. In 1920, it became home for Fortunate and Anna Anselmo, who owned it until 1950.
